casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. GIANT PETROLEUM, INC.
v.
E. CLEVELAND 2018-0648 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 1, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.04 determination. Cause dismissed.
